nodes.text: Magda Gara was a female individual who was the daughter of the Corellian shipping magnate Cilyn Gara. At some point during galactic history, Cilyn was murdered by the Human assassin Kodi Vilthar and after Vilthar was sighted on the planet Chandrila, Madga hired a group of agents to capture Vilthar and bring the assassin to Corellia, so that Vilthar could face justice for causing her father's death.
